text: Businesses today are building
advanced generative AI applications
for text, image, and video generation
as well as high performance computing applications
for pharmaceutical discovery, genomics,
and financial modeling.
For faster time to solution,
they need unprecedented levels of compute performance.
Amazon EC2 P5 Instances powered
by NVIDIA H100 Tensor Core GPUs
deliver the highest performance
in EC2 for training large language models,
and building generative AI and HPC applications at scale.
P5 Instances provide
up to six times higher performance
and can lower compute costs by up to 40% when compared
to previous generation GPU based Instances.
For distributed training and tightly coupled HPC workloads,
P5 Instances provide market-leading scale out capabilities
with up to 3,200 gigabits per second
of elastic fabric adapter Networking.
P5 Instances are deployed in EC2 Ultra Clusters
with up to 20,000 GPUs connected
with petabits scale non-blocking network to deliver
over 20 exaflops of aggregate compute.
Get on-demand access to an Exascale Supercomputer
with Amazon EC2 P5 Instances.
